item.title: Variational Object-aware 3D Hand Pose from a Single RGB Image
item.description: If you find this work useful in yourr research, please cite: @article{gao2019variational, title={Variational Object-Aware 3-D Hand Pose From a Single RGB Image}, author={Gao, Yafei and Wang, Yida and Falco, Pietro and Navab, Nassir and Tombari, Federico}, journal={IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters}, volume={4}, number={4}, pages={4239--4246}, year={2019}, publisher={IEEE} } Abstrarct We propose an approach to estimate the 3D pose of a human hand while grasping objects from a single RGB image.
